summary: An adolescent groupie zeroes in on her Blondie-like idol after the singer chances to cross her orbit on a publicity tour. Gradually their lives intertwine as, with near-operatic intensity, ... See full summary »
cast: Emmanuelle Seigner|Isild Le Besco|Noémie Lvovsky|Valéry Zeitoun|Samuel Benchetrit|Édith Le Merdy|Jean-Paul Walle Wa Wana|Mar Sodupe|Lise Lamétrie|Claude Duneton|Joëlle Miquel|Aurore Auteuil|Yousef Baghdary|Alain Berlioux|Patrick Blanchais|Julien Bossé|Léna Breban|Benjamin Bur|Elya Carle|Stéphane Chapey|Fulvia Collongues|Juste Duvernoy|Marthe Guerin|Anne-Lise Heimburger|Sandy Lakdar|Tassadit Mandi|Laurent Marimbert|Nicolas Maury|Morgane Polanski|Inna Revue|Némo Schiffman|Noémie Zeitoun|Marjolaine Pottlitzer
title: Backstage
